005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import java.util.List;
019
020import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
022
023/**
024 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
025 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-tail">array:tail</a>
026 * function.
027 */
028public final class ArrayTail {
029  private static final String NAME = "tail";
030  @NonNull
031  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
032      .name(NAME)
033      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
034      .deterministic()
035      .contextIndependent()
036      .focusIndependent()
037      .argument(IArgument.builder()
038          .name("array")
039          .type(IArrayItem.class)
040          .one()
041          .build())
042      .returnType(IItem.class)
043      .returnZeroOrOne()
044      .functionHandler(ArrayTail::execute)
045      .build();
046
047  private ArrayTail() {
048    // disable construction
049  }
050
051  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
052  @NonNull
053  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
054      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
055      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
056      IItem focus) {
057    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
058
059    return ISequence.of(tail(array));
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
064   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-tail">array:tail</a>.
065   *
066   * @param <T>
067   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
068   * @param array
069   *          the array to get the tail items from
070   * @return the tail items
071   */
072  @Nullable
073  public static <T extends IItem> IArrayItem<T> tail(@NonNull IArrayItem<T> array) {
074    return ArraySubarray.subarray(array, 2);
075  }
076}
